chips.description: Crunchy and flavorful chips in various flavors.

popcorn.description: Classic movie theater popcorn for a tasty snack.

soda.description: Refreshing carbonated beverage in various flavors.

energyDrink.description: Highly caffeinated beverage for an energy boost.
